title: Pyramid Calculator – volume, surface area, base & slant height

formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: 1. Volume of a pyramid \( V = \frac{1}{3} B h \) where \( B \) is the base area and \( h \) is the vertical height.

formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: 2. Square pyramid Base area: \( B = a^2 \) Slant height: \( \ell = \sqrt{ \left(\frac{a}{2}\right)^2 + h^2 } \) Lateral area: \( A_L = 2 a \ell \) Total area: \( A_T = a^2 + 2 a \ell \)

formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: 3. Rectangular pyramid Base area: \( B = a b \) Slant height along side a: \( \ell_a = \sqrt{ \left(\frac{b}{2}\right)^2 + h^2 } \) Slant height along side b: \( \ell_b = \sqrt{ \left(\frac{a}{2}\right)^2 + h^2 } \) Lateral area: \( A_L = a \ell_a + b \ell_b \) Total area: \( A_T = ab + a \ell_a + b \ell_b \)
